title: Matthew McConaughey Talks Life Lessons And Leaving Your Legacy | Ear Biscuits Ep.309
description:
Two lifelong best friends and Matthew McConaughey talk about life for a long time. Listen to R&L and special guest Matthew McConaughey go into a deep, philosophical dive on how to live a life worth living on this special episode of Ear Biscuits!
Matthew’s Greenlights: Your Journal, Your Journey is coming 12/7/21
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
